episodes_names: Episode 1 - The Handsome Guy is First in Line \ Yaoi Girls from OVERSEAS!!!

Episode 3 - Battle Without Honor and Humanity / Lost in Manga
Episode 4 - Mission: An Outside Work-ish Job
Episode 5 - It's a Book Signing!! Everyone Gather Up \A Fascinating Erotic Story
Episode 6 - The Man with a Secret Power \ Our Fair-Day War
Episode 7 - Tell Me! Wholesaler-san \ A Networking Drinking Party for Booksellers
Episode 8 - Bookstores are so Wonderful! \ The Shelves with and without Restrictions
Episode 9 - A Book about Life, Death, and Rebirth
Episode 10 - An Outstanding Bookseller \ Swapping Section Heads
Episode 11 - The Alternate Skull-face Bookseller Honda-san \ You Can Quit Your Job Whenever You Want
Episode 12 - Merry Christmas, Mr. Bookstore \ It's Time to Close
